Key Match Events: The surging Sacramento Kings (19-19) overwhelmed the Boston Celtics (27-11) in the fourth quarter, cruising to a 114-97 victory on January 11.
Domantas Sabonis put up his 33rd and 15th straight double-double with 23 points and 28 rebounds.
Jaylen Brown delivered a more efficient performance with 28 points and 5 assists after coming back from a shoulder injury.
Kristaps Porzingis almost recorded three straight 20-point, 10-rebound games with 22 points and 10 rebounds.
